alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Mitchell; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 1:38PM EDT until March 12 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Northern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Mitchell County in southwestern Georgia... Northeastern Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 138 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Donalsonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cairo, Bainbridge, Pelham, Donalsonville, Whigham, West Bainbridge, Iron City, Climax, Brinson, Vada, Hanover, Ausmac, Akridge, Capel, Elpino, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Harrells Still and Cyrene. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
